issue.title: [R] R language bindings for Feather format
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3439](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3439). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This will enable work on a "Feather v2" to commence and so that the codebase in github.om/wesm/feather can be finally deprecated

comments.body:
